text: For the time has come for the judging, starting with the church of God; but if it makes a start with us, what will be the end of those who are not under the rule of God?

title: 1 Peter Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: And if it is hard for even the good man to get salvation, what chance has the man without religion or the sinner?

title: 1 Peter Chapter 4 Verse 19
text: For this reason let those who by the purpose of God undergo punishment, keep on in well-doing and put their souls into the safe hands of their Maker.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 1
text: I who am myself one of the rulers of the church, and a witness of the death of Christ, having my part in the coming glory, send this serious request to the chief men among you:

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 2
text: Keep watch over the flock of God which is in your care, using your authority, not as forced to do so, but gladly; and not for unclean profit but with a ready mind;

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 3
text: Not as lords over God's heritage, but making yourselves examples to the flock.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 4
text: And at the coming of the chief Keeper of the sheep, you will be given the eternal crown of glory.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 5
text: And in the same way, let the younger men be ruled by the older ones. Let all of you put away pride and make yourselves ready to be servants: for God is a hater of pride, but he gives grace to those who make themselves low.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 6
text: For this cause make yourselves low under the strong hand of God, so that when the time comes you may be lifted up;

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 7
text: Putting all your troubles on him, for he takes care of you.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 8
text: Be serious and keep watch; the Evil One, who is against you, goes about like a lion with open mouth in search of food;

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 9
text: Do not give way to him but be strong in your faith, in the knowledge that your brothers who are in the world undergo the same troubles.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 10
text: And after you have undergone pain for a little time, the God of all grace who has given you a part in his eternal glory through Christ Jesus, will himself give you strength and support, and make you complete in every good thing;

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 11
text: His is the power for ever. So be it.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 12
text: I have sent you this short letter by Silvanus, a true brother, in my opinion; comforting you and witnessing that this is the true grace of God; keep to it.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 13
text: She who is in Babylon, who has a part with you in the purpose of God, sends you her love; and so does my son Mark.

title: 1 Peter Chapter 5 Verse 14
text: Give one another the kiss of love. Peace be to you all in Christ.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: Simon Peter, a servant and Apostle of Jesus Christ, to those who with us have a part in the same holy faith in the righteousness of our God and Saviour Jesus Christ:

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: May grace and peace ever be increasing in you, in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: Because by his power he has given us everything necessary for life and righteousness, through the knowledge of him who has been our guide by his glory and virtue;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: And through this he has given us the hope of great rewards highly to be valued; so that by them we might have our part in God's being, and be made free from the destruction which is in the world through the desires of the flesh.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: So, for this very cause, take every care; joining virtue to faith, and knowledge to virtue,

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: And self-control to knowledge, and a quiet mind to self-control, and fear of God to a quiet mind,

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: And love of the brothers to fear of God, and to love of the brothers, love itself.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: For if you have these things in good measure, they will make you fertile and full of fruit in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: For the man who has not these things is blind, seeing only what is near, having no memory of how he was made clean from his old sins.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: For this reason, my brothers, take all the more care to make your selection and approval certain; for if you do these things you will never have a fall:

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: For so the way will be open to you into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: For this reason I will be ready at all times to keep your memory of these things awake, though you have the knowledge of them now and are well based in your present faith.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: And it seems right to me, as long as I am in this tent of flesh, to keep your minds awake by working on your memory;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: For I am conscious that in a short time I will have to put off this tent of flesh, as our Lord Jesus Christ has made clear to me.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: And I will take every care so that you may have a clear memory of these things after my death.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: For when we gave you news of the power and the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, our teaching was not based on stories put together by art, but we were eye-witnesses of his glory.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: For God the Father gave him honour and glory, when such a voice came to him out of the great glory, saying, This is my dearly loved Son, with whom I am well pleased.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: And this voice came from heaven even to our ears, when we were with him on the holy mountain.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: And so the words of the prophets are made more certain; and it is well for you to give attention to them as to a light shining in a dark place, till the dawn comes and the morning star is seen in your hearts;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: Being conscious in the first place that no man by himself may give a special sense to the words of the prophets.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 1 Verse 21
text: For these words did not ever come through the impulse of men: but the prophets had them from God, being moved by the Holy Spirit.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: But there were false prophets among the people, as there will be false teachers among you, who will secretly put forward wrong teachings for your destruction, even turning away from the Lord who gave himself for them; whose destruction will come quickly, and they themselves will be the cause of it.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: And a great number will go with them in their evil ways, through whom the true way will have a bad name.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: And in their desire for profit they will come to you with words of deceit, like traders doing business in souls: whose punishment has been ready for a long time and their destruction is watching for them.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: For if God did not have pity for the angels who did evil, but sent them down into hell, to be kept in chains of eternal night till they were judged;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: And did not have mercy on the world which then was, but only kept safe Noah, a preacher of righteousness, with seven others, when he let loose the waters over the world of the evil-doers;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: And sent destruction on Sodom and Gomorrah, burning them up with fire as an example to those whose way of life might in the future be unpleasing to him;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: And kept safe Lot, the upright man, who was deeply troubled by the unclean life of the evil-doers

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: (Because the soul of that upright man living among them was pained from day to day by seeing and hearing their crimes):

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: The Lord is able to keep the upright safe in the time of testing, and to keep evil-doers under punishment till the day of judging;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: But specially those who go after the unclean desires of the flesh, and make sport of authority. Ready to take chances, uncontrolled, they have no fear of saying evil of those in high places:

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: Though the angels, who are greater in strength and power, do not make use of violent language against them before the Lord.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: But these men, like beasts without reason, whose natural use is to be taken and put to death, crying out against things of which they have no knowledge, will undergo that same destruction which they are designing for others;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: For the evil which overtakes them is the reward of their evil-doing: such men take their pleasure in the delights of the flesh even in the daytime; they are like the marks of a disease, like poisoned wounds among you, feasting together with you in joy;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: Having eyes full of evil desire, never having enough of sin; turning feeble souls out of the true way; they are children of cursing, whose hearts are well used to bitter envy;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: Turning out of the true way, they have gone wandering in error, after the way of Balaam, the son of Beor, who was pleased to take payment for wrongdoing;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: But his wrongdoing was pointed out to him: an ass, talking with a man's voice, put a stop to the error of the prophet.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: These are fountains without water, and mists before a driving storm; for whom the eternal night is kept in store.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: For with high-sounding false words, making use of the attraction of unclean desires of the flesh, they get into their power those newly made free from those who are living in error;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: Saying that they will be free, while they themselves are the servants of destruction; because whatever gets the better of a man makes a servant of him.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: For if, after they have got free from the unclean things of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ, they are again taken in the net and overcome, their last condition is worse than their first.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: For it would have been better for them to have had no knowledge of the way of righteousness, than to go back again from the holy law which was given to them, after having knowledge of it.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: They are an example of that true saying, The dog has gone back to the food it had put out, and the pig which had been washed to its rolling in the dirty earth.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: My loved ones, this is now my second letter to you, and in this as in the first, I am attempting to keep your true minds awake;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: So that you may keep in mind the words of the holy prophets in the past, and the law of the Lord and Saviour which was given to you by his Apostles.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: Having first of all the knowledge that in the last days there will be men who, ruled by their evil desires, will make sport of holy things,

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: Saying, Where is the hope of his coming? From the death of the fathers till now everything has gone on as it was from the making of the world.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: But in taking this view they put out of their minds the memory that in the old days there was a heaven, and an earth lifted out of the water and circled by water, by the word of God;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: And that the world which then was came to an end through the overflowing of the waters.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: But the present heaven and the present earth have been kept for destruction by fire, which is waiting for them on the day of the judging and destruction of evil men.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: But, my loved ones, keep in mind this one thing, that with the Lord one day is the same as a thousand years, and a thousand years are no more than one day.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: The Lord is not slow in keeping his word, as he seems to some, but he is waiting in mercy for you, not desiring the destruction of any, but that all may be turned from their evil ways.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: But the day of the Lord will come like a thief; and in that day the heavens will be rolled up with a great noise, and the substance of the earth will be changed by violent heat, and the world and everything in it will be burned up.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: Seeing then that all these things are coming to such an end, what sort of persons is it right for you to be, in all holy behaviour and righteousness,

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: Looking for and truly desiring the coming of the day of God, when the heavens will come to an end through fire, and the substance of the earth will be changed by the great heat?

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: But having faith in his word, we are looking for a new heaven and a new earth, which will be the resting-place of righteousness.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: For this reason, my loved ones, as you are looking for these things, take great care that when he comes you may be in peace before him, free from sin and every evil thing.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: And be certain that the long waiting of the Lord is for salvation; even as our brother Paul has said in his letters to you, from the wisdom which was given to him;

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: And as he said in all his letters, which had to do with these things; in which are some hard sayings, so that, like the rest of the holy Writings, they are twisted by those who are uncertain and without knowledge, to the destruction of their souls.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: For this reason, my loved ones, having knowledge of these things before they take place, take care that you are not turned away by the error of the uncontrolled, so falling from your true faith.

title: 2 Peter Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: But be increased in grace and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. May he have glory now and for ever. So be it.

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: That which was from the first, which has come to our ears, and which we have seen with our eyes, looking on it and touching it with our hands, about the Word of life

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: (And the life was made clear to us, and we have seen it and are witnessing to it and giving you word of that eternal life which was with the Father and was seen by us);

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: We give you word of all we have seen and everything which has come to our ears, so that you may be united with us; and we are united with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ:

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: And we are writing these things to you so that our joy may be made complete.

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: This is the word which came to us from him and which we give to you, that God is light and in him there is nothing dark.

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: If we say we are joined to him, and are walking still in the dark, our words are false and our acts are untrue:

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: But if we are walking in the light, as he is in the light, we are all united with one another, and the blood of Jesus his Son makes us clean from all sin.

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: If we say that we have no sin, we are false to ourselves and there is nothing true in us.

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: If we say openly that we have done wrong, he is upright and true to his word, giving us forgiveness of sins and making us clean from all evil.

title: 1 John Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: If we say that we have no sin, we make him false and his word is not in us.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: My little children, I am writing these things to you so that you may be without sin. And if any man is a sinner, we have a friend and helper with the Father, Jesus Christ, the upright one:

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: He is the offering for our sins; and not for ours only, but for all the world.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: And by this we may be certain that we have knowledge of him, if we keep his laws.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: The man who says, I have knowledge of him, and does not keep his laws, is false, and there is nothing true in him:

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: But in every man who keeps his word, the love of God is made complete. By this we may be certain that we are in him:

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: He who says that he is living in him, will do as he did.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: My loved ones, I do not give you a new law, but an old law which you had from the first; this old law is the word which came to your ears.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: Again, I give you a new law, which is true in him and in you; for the night is near its end and the true light is even now shining out.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: He who says that he is in the light, and has hate in his heart for his brother, is still in the dark.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: He who has love for his brother is in the light, and there is no cause of error in him.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: But he who has hate for his brother is in the dark, walking in the dark with no knowledge of where he is going, unable to see because of the dark.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: I am writing to you, my children, because you have forgiveness of sins through his name.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: I am writing to you, fathers, because you have knowledge of him who was from the first. I am writing to you, young men, because you have overcome the Evil One. I have sent a letter to you, children, because you have knowledge of the Father.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: I have sent a letter to you, fathers, because you have knowledge of him who was from the first. I have sent a letter to you, young men, because you are strong, and the word of God is in you, and because you have overcome the Evil One.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: Have no love for the world or for the things which are in the world. If any man has love for the world, the love of the Father is not in him.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: Because everything in the world, the desire of the flesh, the desire of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father but of the world.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: And the world and its desires is coming to an end: but he who does God's pleasure is living for ever.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: Little children, it is the last hour; and as you were given word that the Antichrist would come, so now a number of Antichrists have come to you; and by this we are certain that it is the last hour.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: They went out from us but they were not of us; if they had been of us they would still be with us: but they went out from us so that it might be made clear that they were not of us.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: And you have the Spirit from the Holy One and you all have knowledge.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: I have not sent you this letter because you have no knowledge of what is true, but because you have knowledge, and because that which is false has nothing in common with that which is true.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: Who is false but he who says that Jesus is not the Christ? He is the Antichrist who has no belief in the Father or the Son.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 23
text: He who has no belief in the Son has not the Father: he who makes clear his belief in the Son has the Father.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 24
text: But as for you, keep in your hearts the things which were made clear to you from the first. If you keep these things in your hearts you will be kept in the Father and the Son.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 25
text: And this is the hope which he gave you, even eternal life.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 26
text: I am writing these things to you about those whose purpose is that you may be turned out of the true way.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 27
text: As for you, the Spirit which he gave you is still in you, and you have no need of any teacher; but as his Spirit gives you teaching about all things, and is true and not false, so keep your hearts in him, through the teaching which he has given you.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 28
text: And now, my children, keep your hearts in him; so that at his revelation, we may have no fear or shame before him at his coming.

title: 1 John Chapter 2 Verse 29
text: If you have knowledge that he is upright, it is clear to you that everyone who does righteousness is his offspring.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: See what great love the Father has given us in naming us the children of God; and such we are. For this reason the world does not see who we are, because it did not see who he was.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: My loved ones, now we are children of God, and at present it is not clear what we are to be. We are certain that at his revelation we will be like him; for we will see him as he is.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: And everyone who has this hope in him makes himself holy, even as he is holy.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: Everyone who is a sinner goes against the law, for sin is going against the law.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: And you have knowledge that he came to take away sin: and in him there is no sin.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: Anyone who is in him does no sin; anyone who is a sinner has not seen him and has no knowledge of him.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: My little children, let no man take you out of the true way: he who does righteousness is upright, even as he is upright;

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: The sinner is a child of the Evil One; for the Evil One has been a sinner from the first. And the Son of God was seen on earth so that he might put an end to the works of the Evil One.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: Anyone who is a child of God does no sin, because he still has God's seed in him; he is not able to be a sinner, because God is his Father.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: In this way it is clear who are the children of God and who are the children of the Evil One; anyone who does not do righteousness or who has no love for his brother, is not a child of God.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: Because this is the word which was given to you from the first, that we are to have love for one another;

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: Not being of the Evil One like Cain, who put his brother to death. And why did he put him to death? Because his works were evil and his brother's works were good.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: Do not be surprised, my brothers, if the world has no love for you.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: We are conscious that we have come out of death into life because of our love for the brothers. He who has no love is still in death.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: Anyone who has hate for his brother is a taker of life, and you may be certain that no taker of life has eternal life in him.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: In this we see what love is, because he gave his life for us; and it is right for us to give our lives for the brothers.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: But if a man has this world's goods, and sees that his brother is in need, and keeps his heart shut against his brother, how is it possible for the love of God to be in him?

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: My little children, do not let our love be in word and in tongue, but let it be in act and in good faith.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 19
text: In this way we may be certain that we are true, and may give our heart comfort before him,

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 20
text: When our heart says that we have done wrong; because God is greater than our heart, and has knowledge of all things.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 21
text: My loved ones, if our heart does not say that we have done wrong, we have no fear before him;

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 22
text: And he gives us all our requests, because we keep his laws and do the things which are pleasing in his eyes.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 23
text: And this is his law, that we have faith in the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love for one another, even as he said to us.

title: 1 John Chapter 3 Verse 24
text: He who keeps his laws is in God and God is in him. And the Spirit which he gave us is our witness that he is in us.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: My loved ones, do not put your faith in every spirit, but put them to the test, to see if they are from God: because a great number of false prophets have gone out into the world.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: By this you may have knowledge of the Spirit of God: every spirit which says that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God:

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: And every spirit which does not say this is not from God: this is the spirit of Antichrist, of which you have had word; and it is in the world even now.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: You are of God, my little children, and you have overcome them because he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: They are of the world, so their talk is the world's talk, and the world gives ear to them.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: We are of God: he who has the knowledge of God gives ear to us; he who is not of God does not give ear to us. By this we may see which is the true spirit, and which is the spirit of error.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: My loved ones, let us have love for one another: because love is of God, and everyone who has love is a child of God and has knowledge of God.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: He who has no love has no knowledge of God, because God is love.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: And the love of God was made clear to us when he sent his only Son into the world so that we might have life through him.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: And this is love, not that we had love for God, but that he had love for us, and sent his Son to be an offering for our sins.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: My loved ones, if God had such love for us, it is right for us to have love for one another.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 12
text: No man has ever seen God: if we have love for one another, God is in us and his love is made complete in us:

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 13
text: And his Spirit which he has given us is the witness that we are in him and he is in us.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 14
text: And we have seen and give witness that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 15
text: Everyone who says openly that Jesus is the Son of God, has God in him and is in God.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 16
text: And we have seen and had faith in the love which God has for us. God is love, and everyone who has love is in God, and God is in him.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 17
text: In this way love is made complete in us, so that we may be without fear on the day of judging, because as he is, so are we in this world.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 18
text: There is no fear in love: true love has no room for fear, because where fear is, there is pain; and he who is not free from fear is not complete in love.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 19
text: We have the power of loving, because he first had love for us.

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 20
text: If a man says, I have love for God, and has hate for his brother, his words are false: for how is the man who has no love for his brother whom he has seen, able to have love for God whom he has not seen?

title: 1 John Chapter 4 Verse 21
text: And this is the word which we have from him, that he who has love for God is to have the same love for his brother.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 1
text: Everyone who has faith that Jesus is the Christ is a child of God: and everyone who has love for the Father has love for his child.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 2
text: In this way, we are certain that we have love for the children of God, when we have love for God and keep his laws.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 3
text: For loving God is keeping his laws: and his laws are not hard.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 4
text: Anything which comes from God is able to overcome the world: and the power by which we have overcome the world is our faith.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 5
text: Who is able to overcome the world but the man who has faith that Jesus is the Son of God?

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 6
text: This is he who came by water and by blood, Jesus Christ; not by water only but by water and by blood.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 7
text: And the Spirit is the witness, because the Spirit is true.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 8
text: There are three witnesses, the Spirit, the water, and the blood: and all three are in agreement.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 9
text: If we take the witness of men to be true, the witness of God is greater: because this is the witness which God has given about his Son.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 10
text: He who has faith in the Son of God has the witness in himself: he who has not faith in God makes him false, because he has not faith in the witness which God has given about his Son.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 11
text: And his witness is this, that God has given us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 12
text: He who has the Son has the life; he who has not the Son of God has not the life.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 13
text: I have put these things in writing for you who have faith in the name of the Son of God, so that you may be certain that you have eternal life.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 14
text: And we are certain that if we make any request to him which is right in his eyes, he will give ear to us:

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 15
text: And if we are certain that he gives ear to all our requests, we are equally certain that we will get our requests.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 16
text: If a man sees his brother doing a sin which is not bad enough for death, let him make a prayer to God, and God will give life to him whose sin was not bad enough for death. There is a sin whose punishment is death: I do not say that he may make such a request then.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 17
text: All evil-doing is sin: but death is not the punishment for every sort of sin.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 18
text: We are certain that one who is a child of God will do no sin, but the Son of God keeps him so that he is not touched by the Evil One.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 19
text: We are certain that we are of God, but all the world is in the power of the Evil One.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 20
text: And we are certain that the Son of God has come, and has given us a clear vision, so that we may see him who is true, and we are in him who is true, in his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.

title: 1 John Chapter 5 Verse 21
text: My little children, keep yourselves from false gods.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: I, a ruler in the church, send word to the noble sister who is of God's selection, and to her children, for whom I have true love; and not only I, but all who have knowledge of what is true;

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: Because of this true knowledge which is in us, and will be with us for ever:

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: May grace, mercy, and peace be with us from God the Father, and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in all true love.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: It gave me great joy to see some of your children walking in the true way, even as we were ordered to do by the Father.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: And now, my sister, I make a request to you, not sending you a new law, but the law which we had from the first, that we have love for one another.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: And love is the keeping of his laws. This is the law which was given to you from the first, so that you might keep it.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: Because a number of false teachers have gone out into the world, who do not give witness that Jesus Christ came in the flesh. Such a one is a false teacher and Antichrist.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: Keep watch over yourselves, so that you do not make our work of no effect, but may get your full reward.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: Anyone who goes on and does not keep to the teaching of Christ, has not God: he who keeps to the teaching has the Father and the Son.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: If anyone comes to you not having this teaching, do not take him into your house or give him words of love:

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: For he who gives him words of love has a part in his evil works.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: Having much to say to you, it is not my purpose to put it all down with paper and ink: but I am hoping to come to you, and to have talk with you face to face, so that your joy may be full.

title: 2 John Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: The children of your noble sister, who is of God's selection, send you their love.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: I, a ruler in the church, send word to the well loved Gaius, for whom I have true love.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: My loved one, it is my prayer that you may do well in all things, and be healthy in body, even as your soul does well.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: For it gave me great joy when some of the brothers came and gave witness that you had the true faith and were walking in the true way.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: I have no greater joy than to have news that my children are walking in the true way.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: My loved one, you are doing a good work in being kind to those brothers who come from other places;

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: Who have given witness to the church of your love for them: and you will do well to send them on their way well cared for, as is right for servants of God:

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: For they went out for love of the Name, taking nothing from the Gentiles.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: So it is right for us to take in such men as guests, so that we may take our part in the work of the true faith.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: I sent a letter to the church, but Diotrephes, whose desire is ever to have the first place among them, will not have us there.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: So if I come, I will keep in mind the things he does, talking against us with evil words: and as if this was not enough, he does not take the brothers into his house, and those who are ready to take them in, he keeps from doing so, putting them out of the church if they do.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: My loved one, do not be copying what is evil, but what is good. He who does good is of God: he who does evil has not seen God.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: Demetrius has the approval of all men and of what is true: and we give the same witness, and you are certain that our witness is true.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: I had much to say to you, but it is not my purpose to put it all down with ink and pen:

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: But I am hoping to see you in a short time, and to have talk with you face to face.

title: 3 John Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: May you have peace. Your friends here send you their love. Give my love to our friends by name.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ and the brother of James, to those of God's selection who have been made holy by God the Father and are kept safe for Jesus Christ:

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: May mercy and peace and love be increased in you.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: My loved ones, while my thoughts were full of a letter which I was going to send you about our common salvation, it was necessary for me to send you one requesting you with all my heart to go on fighting strongly for the faith which has been given to the saints once and for ever.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: For certain men have come among you secretly, marked out before in the holy Writings for this evil fate, men without the fear of God, turning his grace into an unclean thing, and false to our only Master and Lord, Jesus Christ.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: Now it is my purpose to put you in mind, though you once had knowledge of all these things, of how the Lord, having taken a people safely out of Egypt, later sent destruction on those who had no faith;

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: And the angels who did not keep to their kingdom but went out from the place which was theirs, he has put in eternal chains and in dark night till the great day of the judging.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrah, and the towns near them, having like these, given themselves up to unclean desires and gone after strange flesh, have been made an example, undergoing the punishment of eternal fire.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: In the same way these dreamers make the flesh unclean, having no respect for authorities, and say evil of rulers.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: Now when Michael, one of the chief angels, was fighting against the Evil One for the body of Moses, fearing to make use of violent words against him, he only said, May the Lord be your judge.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: But these men say evil about such things as they have no knowledge of; and the things of which they have natural knowledge, like beasts without reason, are the cause of their destruction.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: A curse on them! They have gone in the way of Cain, running uncontrolled into the error of Balaam for reward, and have come to destruction by saying evil against the Lord, like Korah.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: These men are unseen rocks at your love-feasts, when they take part in them with you, keepers of sheep who without fear take the food of the sheep; clouds without water rushing before the wind, wasted trees without fruit, twice dead, pulled up by the roots,

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: Violent waves of the sea, streaming with their shame, wandering stars for whom the darkest night is kept in store for ever.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: The prophet Enoch, who was the seventh after Adam, said of these men, The Lord came with tens of thousands of his saints,

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: To be the judge of all, and to give a decision against all those whose lives are unpleasing to him, because of the evil acts which they have done, and because of all the hard things which sinners without fear of God have said against him.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: These are the men who make trouble, ever desiring change, going after evil pleasures, using high-sounding words, respecting men's position in the hope of reward.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: But you, my loved ones, keep in memory the words which were said before by the Apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ,

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: How they said to you, In the last days there will be men who, guided by their evil desires, will make sport of holy things.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: These are the men who make divisions, natural men, not having the Spirit.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: But you, my loved ones, building yourselves up on your most holy faith, and making prayers in the Holy Spirit,

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 21
text: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for life eternal through the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 22
text: And have pity on those who are in doubt;

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 23
text: And to some give salvation, pulling them out of the fire; and on some have mercy with fear, hating even the clothing which is made unclean by the flesh.

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 24
text: Now to him who is able to keep you from falling, and to give you a place in his glory, free from all evil, with great joy,

title: Jude Chapter 1 Verse 25
text: To the only God our Saviour, through Jesus Christ our Lord, let us give glory and honour and authority and power, before all time and now and for ever. So be it.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ which God gave him so that his servants might have knowledge of the things which will quickly take place: and he sent and made it clear by his angel to his servant John;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: Who gave witness of the word of God, and of the witness of Jesus Christ, even of all the things which he saw.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: A blessing be on the reader, and on those who give ear to the prophet's words, and keep the things which he has put in the book: for the time is near.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from him who is and was and is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his high seat;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: And from Jesus Christ, the true witness, the first to come back from the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To him who had love for us and has made us clean from our sins by his blood;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: And has made us to be a kingdom and priests to his God and Father; to him let glory and power be given for ever and ever. So be it.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: See, he comes with the clouds, and every eye will see him, and those by whom he was wounded; and all the tribes of the earth will be sorrowing because of him. Yes, so be it.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: I am the First and the Last, says the Lord God who is and was and is to come, the Ruler of all.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: I, John, your brother, who have a part with you in the trouble and the kingdom and the quiet strength of Jesus, was in the island which is named Patmos, for the word of God and the witness of Jesus.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day, and a great voice at my back, as of a horn, came to my ears,

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: Saying, What you see, put in a book, and send it to the seven churches; to Ephesus and to Smyrna and to Pergamos and to Thyatira and to Sardis and to Philadelphia and to Laodicea.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: And turning to see the voice which said these words to me, I saw seven gold vessels with lights burning in them;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: And in the middle of them one like a son of man, clothed with a robe down to his feet, and with a band of gold round his breasts.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: And his head and his hair were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: And his feet like polished brass, as if it had been burned in a fire; and his voice was as the sound of great waters.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth came a sharp two-edged sword: and his face was like the sun shining in its strength.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: And when I saw him, I went down on my face at his feet as one dead. And he put his right hand on me, saying, Have no fear; I am the first and the last and the Living one;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: And I was dead, and see, I am living for ever, and I have the keys of death and of Hell.

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: Put in writing, then, the things which you have seen, and the things which are, and the things which will be after these;

title: Revelation Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: The secret of the seven stars which you saw in my right hand, and of the seven gold vessels with burning lights. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven lights are the seven churches.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: To the angel of the church in Ephesus say: These things says he who has the seven stars in his right hand, who is walking in the middle of the seven gold lights:

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: I have knowledge of your doings, and of your hard work and long waiting, and that you will not put up with evil men, and have put to the test those who say they are Apostles and are not, and have seen that they are false;

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: And you have the power of waiting, and have undergone trouble because of my name, without weariness.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: But I have this against you, that you are turned away from your first love.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: So keep in mind where you were at first, and be changed in heart and do the first works; or I will come to you, and will take away your light from its place, if your hearts are not changed.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: But at least you have the credit of hating the works of the Nicolaitans, as I do.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches. To him who overcomes I will give of the fruit of the tree of life, which is in the Paradise of God.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: And to the angel of the church in Smyrna say: These things says the first and the last, who was dead and is living:

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: I have knowledge of your troubles and how poor you are (but you have true wealth), and the evil words of those who say they are Jews, and are not, but are a Synagogue of Satan.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: Have no fear of the things which you will have to undergo: see, the Evil One will send some of you into prison, so that you may be put to the test; and you will have great trouble for ten days. Be true till death, and I will give you the crown of life.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches. He who overcomes will not come under the power of the second death.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: And to the angel of the church in Pergamos say: These things says he who has the sharp two-edged sword:

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: I have knowledge that your living-place is where Satan has his seat: and you are true to my name, and were not turned away from your faith in me, even in the days of Antipas, my true witness, who was put to death among you, where Satan has his place.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: But I have some things against you, because you have with you those who keep the teaching of Balaam, by whose suggestion Balak made the children of Israel go out of the right way, taking food which was offered to false gods, and going after the desires of the flesh.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: And you have those who keep the teaching of the Nicolaitans.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: See, then, that you have a change of heart; or I will come to you quickly, and will make war against them with the sword of my mouth.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches. To him who overcomes I will give of the secret manna, and I will give him a white stone, and on the stone a new name, of which no one has knowledge but he to whom it is given.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: And to the angel of the church in Thyatira say: These things says the Son of God, whose eyes are like a flame of fire, and his feet like polished brass:

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: I have knowledge of your works, and your love and faith and help and strength in trouble, and that your last works are more than the first.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: But I have this against you, that you let the woman Jezebel say she is a prophet and give false teaching, making my servants go after the desires of the flesh and take food offered to false gods.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: And I gave her time for a change of heart, but she has no mind to give up her unclean ways.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: See, I will put her into a bed, and those who make themselves unclean with her, into great trouble, if they go on with her works.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 23
text: And I will put her children to death; and all the churches will see that I am he who makes search into the secret thoughts and hearts of men: and I will give to every one of you the reward of your works.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 24
text: But to you I say, to the rest in Thyatira, even to those who have not this teaching, and have no knowledge of the secrets of Satan, as they say; I put on you no other weight.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 25
text: But what you have, keep safe till I come.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 26
text: He who overcomes, and keeps my works to the end, to him I will give rule over the nations,

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 27
text: And he will be ruling them with a rod of iron; as the vessels of the potter they will be broken, even as I have power from my Father:

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 28
text: And I will give him the morning star.

title: Revelation Chapter 2 Verse 29
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: And to the angel of the church in Sardis say: These things says he who has the seven Spirits of God and the seven stars: I have knowledge of your works, that you seem to be living but are dead.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: Be on the watch, and make strong the rest of the things which are near to death; because as judged by me your works have not come up to God's measure.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: Keep in mind, then, the teaching which was given to you, and be ruled by it and have a change of heart. If then you do not keep watch, I will come like a thief, and you will have no knowledge of the hour when I will come on you.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: But you have some names in Sardis who have kept clean their robes; and as a reward they will go in white with me.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: He who overcomes will be dressed in white, and I will not take his name from the book of life, and I will give witness to his name before my Father, and before his angels.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia say: These things says he who is holy, he who is true, he who has the key of David, opening the door so that it may be shut by no one, and shutting it so that it may be open to no one.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: I have knowledge of your works (see, I have put before you an open door which may be shut by no one), and that you have a little strength, and have kept my word, and have been true to my name.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: See, I will make those of the Synagogue of Satan who say they are Jews, and are not, but say what is false; I will make them come and give worship before your feet, and see my love for you.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: Because you have kept my word in quiet strength, I will keep you from the hour of testing which is coming on all the world, to put to the test those who are on earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: I come quickly: keep that which you have, so that no one may take your crown.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: Him who overcomes I will make a pillar in the house of my God, and he will go out no more: and I will put on him the name of my God, and the name of the town of my God, the new Jerusalem, which comes down out of heaven from my God, and my new name.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: And to the angel of the church in Laodicea say: These things says the true and certain witness, the head of God's new order:

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: I have knowledge of your works, that you are not cold or warm: it would be better if you were cold or warm.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: So because you are not one thing or the other, I will have no more to do with you.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: For you say, I have wealth, and have got together goods and land, and have need of nothing; and you are not conscious of your sad and unhappy condition, that you are poor and blind and without clothing.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: If you are wise you will get from me gold tested by fire, so that you may have true wealth; and white robes to put on, so that your shame may not be seen; and oil for your eyes, so that you may see.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 19
text: To all those who are dear to me, I give sharp words and punishment: then with all your heart have sorrow for your evil ways.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 20
text: See, I am waiting at the door and giving the sign; if my voice comes to any man's ears and he makes the door open, I will come in to him, and will take food with him and he with me.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 21
text: To him who overcomes I will give a place with me on my high seat, even as I overcame, and am seated with my Father on his high seat.

title: Revelation Chapter 3 Verse 22
text: He who has ears, let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 1
text: After these things I saw a door open in heaven, and the first voice came to my ears, like the sound of a horn, saying, Come up here, and I will make clear to you the things which are to come.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 2
text: Straight away I was in the Spirit: and I saw a high seat in heaven, and one was seated on it;

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 3
text: And to my eyes he was like a jasper and a sardius stone: and there was an arch of light round the high seat, like an emerald.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 4
text: And round about the high seat were four and twenty seats: and on them I saw four and twenty rulers seated, clothed in white robes; and on their heads crowns of gold.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 5
text: And out of the high seat came flames and voices and thunders. And seven lights of fire were burning before the high seat, which are the seven Spirits of God;

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 6
text: And before the high seat there was, as it seemed, a clear sea of glass; and in the middle of the high seat, and round about it, four beasts full of eyes round about.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 7
text: And the first beast was like a lion, and the second like an ox, and the third had a face like a man, and the fourth was like an eagle in flight.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 8
text: And the four beasts, having every one of them six wings, are full of eyes round about and inside: and without resting day and night, they say, Holy, holy, holy, Lord God, Ruler of all, who was and is and is to come.

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 9
text: And when the beasts give glory and honour to him who is seated on the high seat, to him who is living for ever and ever,

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 10
text: The four and twenty rulers go down on their faces before him who is seated on the high seat, and give worship to him who is living for ever and ever, and take off their crowns before the high seat, saying,

title: Revelation Chapter 4 Verse 11
text: It is right, our Lord and our God, for you to have glory and honour and power: because by you were all things made, and by your desire they came into being.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 1
text: And I saw in the right hand of him who was seated on the high seat, a book with writing inside it and on the back, shut with seven stamps of wax.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 2
text: And I saw a strong angel saying in a loud voice, Who is able to make the book open, and to undo its stamps?

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 3
text: And no one in heaven, or on the earth, or under the earth, was able to get the book open, or to see what was in it.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 4
text: And I was very sad, because there was no one able to get the book open or to see what was in it.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 5
text: And one of the rulers said to me, Do not be sad: see, the Lion of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has overcome, and has power to undo the book and its seven stamps.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 6
text: And I saw in the middle of the high seat and of the four beasts, and in the middle of the rulers, a Lamb in his place, which seemed as if it had been put to death, having seven horns and seven eyes, which are the seven Spirits of God, sent out into all the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 7
text: And he came and took it out of the right hand of him who was seated on the high seat.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 8
text: And when he had taken the book, the four beasts and the four and twenty rulers went down on their faces before the Lamb, having every one an instrument of music, and gold vessels full of perfumes, which are the prayers of the saints.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 9
text: And their voices are sounding in a new song, saying, It is right for you to take the book and to make it open: for you were put to death and have made an offering to God of your blood for men of every tribe, and language, and people, and nation,

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 10
text: And have made them a kingdom and priests to our God, and they are ruling on the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 11
text: And I saw, and there came to my ears the sound of a great number of angels round about the high seat and the beasts and the rulers; and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand, and thousands of thousands;

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 12
text: Saying with a great voice, It is right to give to the Lamb who was put to death, power and wealth and wisdom and strength and honour and glory and blessing.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 13
text: And to my ears came the voice of everything in heaven and on earth and under the earth and in the sea, and of all things which are in them, saying, To him who is seated on the high seat, and to the Lamb, may blessing and honour and glory and power be given for ever and ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 5 Verse 14
text: And the four beasts said, So be it. And the rulers went down on their faces and gave worship.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 1
text: And I saw when the Lamb undid one of the stamps, and the voice of one of the four beasts came to my ears, saying as with a voice of thunder, Come and see.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 2
text: And I saw a white horse, and he who was seated on it had a bow; and there was given to him a crown: and he went out with power to overcome.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 3
text: And when the second stamp was undone, the voice of the second beast came to my ears, saying, Come and see.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 4
text: And another horse came out, a red horse; and it was given to him who was seated on it to take peace from the earth, so that people might put one another to death: and there was given to him a great sword.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 5
text: And when the third stamp was undone, the voice of the third beast came to my ears, saying, Come and see. And I saw a black horse; and he who was seated on it had scales in his hand.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 6
text: And a voice came to my ears, from the middle of the four beasts, saying, A measure of grain for a penny, and three measures of barley for a penny: and see that you do no damage to the oil and the wine.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 7
text: And when the fourth stamp was undone, the voice of the fourth beast came to my ears, saying, Come and see.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 8
text: And I saw a grey horse, and the name of him who was seated on it was Death; and Hell came after him. And there was given to them authority over the fourth part of the earth, to put to destruction by the sword, and by taking away their food, and by death, and by the beasts of the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 9
text: And when the fifth stamp was undone, I saw under the altar the souls of those who had been put to death for the word of God, and for the witness which they kept.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 10
text: And they gave a great cry, saying, How long will it be, O Ruler, holy and true, before you take your place as judge and give punishment for our blood to those on the earth?

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 11
text: And there was given to every one a white robe, and they were ordered to take their rest for a little time, till the number was complete of the other servants, their brothers, who would be put to death, even as they had been.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 12
text: And I saw when the sixth stamp was undone, and there was a great earth-shock; and the sun became black as haircloth, and all the moon became as blood;

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 13
text: And the stars of heaven were falling to the earth, like green fruit from a tree before the force of a great wind.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 14
text: And the heaven was taken away like the roll of a book when it is rolled up; and all the mountains and islands were moved out of their places.

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 15
text: And the kings of the earth, and the rulers, and the chief captains, and the men of wealth, and the strong, and every servant and free man, took cover in the holes and the rocks of the mountains;

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 16
text: And they say to the mountains and to the rocks, Come down on us, covering us from the face of him who is seated on the high seat, and from the wrath of the Lamb:

title: Revelation Chapter 6 Verse 17
text: For the great day of their wrath is come, and who may keep his place?

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 1
text: After this I saw four angels in their places at the four points of the earth, keeping back the four winds in their hands, so that there might be no moving of the wind on the earth, or on the sea, or on any tree.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 2
text: And I saw another angel coming up from the east, having the mark of the living God: and he said with a great voice to the four angels, to whom it was given to do damage to the earth and the sea,

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 3
text: Do no damage to the earth, or the sea, or the trees, till we have put a mark on the servants of our God.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 4
text: And there came to my ears the number of those who had the mark on their brows, a hundred and forty-four thousand, who were marked out of every tribe of the people of Israel.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 5
text: Of the tribe of Judah were marked twelve thousand: of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand: of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand:

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 6
text: Of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand: of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand: of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand:

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 7
text: Of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand: of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand: of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand:

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 8
text: Of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand: of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand: of the tribe of Benjamin were marked twelve thousand.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 9
text: After these things I saw a great army of people more than might be numbered, out of every nation and of all tribes and peoples and languages, taking their places before the high seat and before the Lamb, dressed in white robes, and with branches in their hands,

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 10
text: Saying with a loud voice, Salvation to our God who is seated on the high seat, and to the Lamb.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 11
text: And all the angels were round about the high seat, and about the rulers and the four beasts; and they went down on their faces before the high seat, and gave worship to God, saying,

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 12
text: So be it. Let blessing and glory and wisdom and praise and honour and power and strength be given to our God for ever and ever. So be it.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 13
text: And one of the rulers made answer, saying to me, These who have on white robes, who are they, and where did they come from?

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 14
text: And I said to him, My lord, you have knowledge. And he said to me, These are they who came through the great testing, and their robes have been washed and made white in the blood of the Lamb.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 15
text: This is why they are before the high seat of God; and they are his servants day and night in his house: and he who is seated on the high seat will be a tent over them.

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 16
text: They will never be in need of food or drink: and they will never again be troubled by the burning heat of the sun:

title: Revelation Chapter 7 Verse 17
text: For the Lamb who is on the high seat will be their keeper and their guide to fountains of living water: and God will make glad their eyes for ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 1
text: And when the seventh stamp was undone there was quiet in heaven for about half an hour.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 2
text: And I saw the seven angels who had their place before God; and seven horns were given to them.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 3
text: And another angel came and took his place at the altar, having a gold vessel for burning perfume; and there was given to him much perfume, so that he might put it with the prayers of all the saints on the gold altar which was before the high seat.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 4
text: And the smoke of the perfume, with the prayers of the saints, went up before God out of the angel's hand.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 5
text: And the angel took the vessel; and he made it full of the fire of the altar, and sent it down on the earth: and there came thunders and voices and flames and a shaking of the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 6
text: And the seven angels who had the seven horns made ready for sounding them.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 7
text: And at the sounding of the first, a rain of ice and fire, mixed with blood, was sent on the earth: and a third part of the earth, and of the trees, and all green grass was burned up.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 8
text: And at the sounding of the second angel, it was as if a great mountain burning with fire was sent into the sea: and a third part of the sea became blood,

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 9
text: And destruction came on a third part of the living things which were in the sea, and on a third part of the ships.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 10
text: And at the sounding of the third angel, there went down from heaven a great star, burning like a flame, and it came on a third part of the rivers, and on the fountains of water.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 11
text: And the name of the star is Wormwood: and a third part of the waters became bitter; and a number of men came to their end because of the waters, for they were made bitter.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 12
text: And at the sounding of the fourth angel, a third part of the sun, and of the moon, and of the stars was made dark, so that there was no light for a third part of the day and of the night.

title: Revelation Chapter 8 Verse 13
text: And there came to my ears the cry of an eagle in flight in the middle of heaven, saying with a great voice, Trouble, trouble, trouble, to all on the earth, because of the other voices of the horns of the three angels, whose sounding is still to come.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 1
text: And at the sounding of the fifth angel I saw a star falling from heaven to the earth: and there was given to him the key of the great deep.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 2
text: And he made the great deep open and a smoke went up from it, like the smoke of a great oven; and the sun and the air were made dark because of the smoke.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 3
text: And from the smoke locusts came out on the earth; and power was given them, like the power of scorpions.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 4
text: And they were ordered to do no damage to the grass of the earth, or any green thing, or any tree, but only to such men as have not the mark of God on their brows.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 5
text: And orders were given them not to put them to death, but to give them great pain for five months: and their pain was as the pain from the wound of a scorpion.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 6
text: And in those days men will be hoping for death, and it will not come to them; and they will have a great desire for death, and death will go in flight from them.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 7
text: And the forms of the locusts were like horses made ready for war; and on their heads they had crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 8
text: And they had hair like the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 9
text: And they had breastplates like iron, and the sound of their wings was as the sound of carriages, like an army of horses rushing to the fight.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 10
text: And they have pointed tails like scorpions; and in their tails is their power to give men wounds for five months.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 11
text: They have over them as king the angel of the great deep: his name in Hebrew is Abaddon, and in the Greek language Apollyon.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 12
text: The first Trouble is past: see, there are still two Troubles to come.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 13
text: And at the sounding of the sixth angel a voice came to my ears from the horns of the gold altar which is before God,

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 14
text: Saying to the sixth angel who had the horn, Make free the four angels who are chained at the great river Euphrates.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 15
text: And the four angels were made free, who were ready for the hour and day and month and year, that they might put to death a third part of men.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 16
text: And the number of the armies of the horsemen was twice ten thousand times ten thousand: the number of them came to my ears.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 17
text: And so I saw the horses in the vision, and those who were seated on them, having breastplates of fire and glass and of burning stone: and the heads of the horses were as the heads of lions; and out of their mouths came fire and smoke and a smell of burning.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 18
text: By these evils a third part of men was put to death, by the fire, and the smoke, and the burning smell which came out of their mouths.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 19
text: For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails: because their tails are like snakes, and have heads, and with them they give wounds.

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 20
text: And the rest of the people, who were not put to death by these evils, were not turned from the works of their hands, but went on giving worship to evil spirits, and images of gold and silver and brass and stone and wood which have no power of seeing or hearing or walking:

title: Revelation Chapter 9 Verse 21
text: And they had no regret for putting men to death, or for their use of secret arts, or for the evil desires of the flesh, or for taking the property of others.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 1
text: And I saw another strong angel coming down out of heaven, clothed with a cloud; and an arch of coloured light was round his head, and his face was like the sun, and his feet like pillars of fire;

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 2
text: And he had in his hand a little open book: and he put his right foot on the sea, and his left on the earth;

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 3
text: And he gave a loud cry, like the angry voice of a lion: and at his cry the voices of the seven thunders were sounding.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 4
text: And when the seven thunders had given out their voices, I was about to put their words down: and a voice from heaven came to my ears, saying, Keep secret the things which the seven thunders said, and do not put them in writing.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 5
text: And the angel which I saw taking his position on the sea and on the earth, put up his right hand to heaven,

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 6
text: And took his oath by him who is living for ever and ever, who made the heaven and the things in it, and the earth and the things in it, and the sea and the things in it, that there would be no more waiting:

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 7
text: But in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when the sound of his horn is about to come, then will the secret of God be complete, of which he gave the good news to his servants the prophets.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 8
text: And the voice came to me again from heaven, saying, Go, take the book which is open in the hand of the angel who has his place on the sea and on the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 9
text: And I went to the angel, and said to him, Give me the little book. And he said to me: Put it in your mouth; and it will make your stomach bitter, but in your mouth it will be sweet as honey.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 10
text: And I took the little book out of the angel's hand and did as he said; and it was sweet as honey in my mouth: and when I had taken it, my stomach was made bitter.

title: Revelation Chapter 10 Verse 11
text: And they said to me, You are to give word again of what is coming in the future to the peoples and nations and languages and kings.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 1
text: And there was given to me a measuring rod: and one said, Go up and take the measure of the house of God, and the altar, and the worshippers in it.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 2
text: But do not take the measure of the space outside the house; because it has been given to the nations: and the holy town will be under their feet for forty-two months.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 3
text: And I will give orders to my two witnesses, and they will be prophets for a thousand, two hundred and sixty days, clothed with haircloth.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 4
text: These are the two olive-trees and the two lights, which are before the Lord of the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 5
text: And if any man would do them damage, fire comes out of their mouth and puts an end to those who are working against them: and if any man has a desire to do them damage, in this way will he be put to death.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 6
text: These have the power to keep the heaven shut, so that there may be no rain in the days when they are prophets: and they have power over the waters to make them into blood, and to send every sort of disease on the earth as their pleasure is.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 7
text: And when they have come to the end of their witness, the beast which comes up out of the great deep will make war on them and overcome them and put them to death.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 8
text: And their dead bodies will be in the open street of the great town, which in the spirit is named Sodom and Egypt, where their Lord was put to death on the cross.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 9
text: And the peoples and tribes and languages and nations will be looking on their dead bodies three days and a half, and will not let their dead bodies be put in the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 10
text: And those who are on the earth will have pleasure and delight over them; and they will send offerings one to another because these two prophets gave great trouble to all on the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 11
text: And after three days and a half the breath of life from God went into them, and they got up on their feet; and great fear came on those who saw them.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 12
text: And a great voice from heaven came to their ears, saying to them, Come up here. And they went up into heaven in the cloud, and were seen by those desiring their death.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 13
text: And in that hour there was a great earth-shock and a tenth part of the town came to destruction; and in the earth-shock seven thousand persons came to their end: and the rest were in fear, and gave glory to the God of heaven.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 14
text: The second Trouble is past: see, the third Trouble comes quickly.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 15
text: And at the sounding of the seventh angel there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord, and of his Christ, and he will have rule for ever and ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 16
text: And the four and twenty rulers, who are seated before God on their high seats, went down on their faces and gave worship to God, saying,

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 17
text: We give you praise, O Lord God, Ruler of all, who is and who was; because you have taken up your great power and are ruling your kingdom.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 18
text: And the nations were angry, and your wrath has come, and the time for the dead to be judged, and the time of reward for your servants, the prophets, and for the saints, and for those in whom is the fear of your name, small and great, and the time of destruction for those who made the earth unclean.

title: Revelation Chapter 11 Verse 19
