text: And the house of God which is in heaven was open; and the ark of his agreement was seen in his house, and there were flames and voices and thunders and an earth-shock and a rain of ice.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 1
text: And a great sign was seen in heaven: a A woman clothed with the sun, and with the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 2
text: And she was with child; and she gave a cry, in the pains of childbirth.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 3
text: And there was seen another sign in heaven; a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on his heads seven crowns.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 4
text: And his tail was pulling a third part of the stars of heaven down to the earth, and the dragon took his place before the woman who was about to give birth, so that when the birth had taken place he might put an end to her child.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 5
text: And she gave birth to a son, a male child, who was to have rule over all the nations with a rod of iron: and her child was taken up to God and to his high seat.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 6
text: And the woman went in flight to the waste land, where she has a place made ready by God, so that there they may give her food a thousand, two hundred and sixty days.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 7
text: And there was war in heaven: Michael and his angels going out to the fight with the dragon; and the dragon and his angels made war,

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 8
text: And they were overcome, and there was no more place for them in heaven.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 9
text: And the great dragon was forced down, the old snake, who is named the Evil One and Satan, by whom all the earth is turned from the right way; he was forced down to the earth, and his angels were forced down with him.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 10
text: And a great voice in heaven came to my ears, saying, Now is come the salvation, and the power, and the kingdom of our God, and the authority of his Christ: because he who says evil against our brothers before our God day and night is forced down.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 11
text: And they overcame him through the blood of the Lamb and the word of their witness; and loving not their lives they freely gave themselves up to death.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 12
text: Be glad then, O heavens, and you who are in them. But there is trouble for the earth and the sea: because the Evil One has come down to you, being very angry, having the knowledge that he has but a short time.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 13
text: And when the dragon saw that he was forced down to the earth, he made cruel attacks on the woman who gave birth to the male child.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 14
text: And there were given to the woman two wings of a great eagle, so that she might go in flight into the waste land, to her place, where she is given food for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the snake.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 15
text: And the snake sent out of his mouth after the woman a river of water, so that she might be taken away by the stream.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 16
text: And the earth gave help to the woman, and with open mouth took up the river which the dragon sent out of his mouth.

title: Revelation Chapter 12 Verse 17
text: And the dragon was angry with the woman and went away to make war on the rest of her seed, who keep the orders of God, and the witness of Jesus:

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 1
text: And he took his place on the sand of the sea. And I saw a beast coming up out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads, and on his horns ten crowns, and on his heads unholy names.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 2
text: And the beast which I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were as the feet of a bear, and his mouth as the mouth of a lion: and the dragon gave him his power and his seat and great authority.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 3
text: And I saw one of his heads as if it had been given a death-wound; and his death-wound was made well: and all the earth was wondering at the beast.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 4
text: And they gave worship to the dragon, because he gave authority to the beast; and worshipping the beast, they said, Who is like the beast? and who is able to go to war with him?

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 5
text: And there was given to him a mouth to say words of pride against God; and there was given to him authority to go on for forty-two months.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 6
text: And his mouth was open to say evil against God, and against his name and his Tent, even against those who are in heaven.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 7
text: And it was given to him to make war on the saints and to overcome them: and there was given to him authority over every tribe and people and language and nation.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 8
text: And all who are on the earth will give him worship, everyone whose name has not been from the first in the book of life of the Lamb who was put to death.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 9
text: If any man has ears, let him give ear.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 10
text: If any man sends others into prison, into prison he will go: if any man puts to death with the sword, with the sword will he be put to death. Here is the quiet strength and the faith of the saints.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 11
text: And I saw another beast coming up out of the earth; and he had two horns like a lamb, and his voice was like that of a dragon.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 12
text: And he makes use of all the authority of the first beast before his eyes. And he makes the earth and those who are in it give worship to the first beast, whose death-wound was made well.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 13
text: And he does great signs, even making fire come down from heaven on the earth before the eyes of men.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 14
text: And those who are on the earth are turned from the true way by him through the signs which he was given power to do before the beast; giving orders to those who are on the earth to make an image to the beast, who was wounded by the sword, and came to life.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 15
text: And he had power to give breath to the image of the beast, so that words might come from the image of the beast, and that he might have all those who did not give worship to the image of the beast put to death.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 16
text: And he gives to all, small and great, the poor and those who have wealth, the free and those who are not free, a mark on their right hand or on their brows;

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 17
text: So that no man might be able to do trade but he who has the mark, even the name of the beast or the number of his name.

title: Revelation Chapter 13 Verse 18
text: Here is wisdom. He who has knowledge let him get the number of the beast; because it is the number of a man: and his number is Six hundred and sixty-six.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 1
text: And I saw the Lamb on the mountain of Zion, and with him a hundred and forty-four thousand, marked on their brows with his name and the name of his Father.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 2
text: And a voice from heaven came to my ears, like the sound of great waters, and the sound of loud thunder: and the voice which came to me was like the sound of players, playing on instruments of music.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 3
text: And they made as it seemed a new song before the high seat, and before the four beasts and the rulers: and no man might have knowledge of the song but the hundred and forty-four thousand, even those from the earth whom God has made his for a price.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 4
text: These are they who have not made themselves unclean with women; for they are virgins. These are they who go after the Lamb wherever he goes. These were taken from among men to be the first fruits to God and to the Lamb.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 5
text: And in their mouth there was no false word, for they are untouched by evil.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 6
text: And I saw another angel in flight between heaven and earth, having eternal good news to give to those who are on the earth, and to every nation and tribe and language and people,

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 7
text: Saying with a loud voice, Have fear of God and give him glory; because the hour of his judging is come; and give worship to him who made heaven and earth and the sea and the fountains of water.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 8
text: And a second angel came after, saying, Destruction has come to Babylon the great, which gave to all the nations the wine of the wrath of her evil ways.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 9
text: And a third angel came after them, saying with a loud voice, If any man gives worship to the beast and his image, and has his mark on his brow or on his hand,

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 10
text: To him will be given of the wine of God's wrath which is ready unmixed in the cup of his wrath and he will have cruel pain, burning with fire before the holy angels and before the Lamb:

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 11
text: And the smoke of their pain goes up for ever and ever; and they have no rest day and night, who give worship to the beast and his image, and have on them the mark of his name.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 12
text: Here is the quiet strength of the saints, who keep the orders of God, and the faith of Jesus.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 13
text: And a voice from heaven came to my ears, saying, Put in writing, There is a blessing on the dead who from now on come to their end in the Lord: yes, says the Spirit, that they may have rest from their troubles; for their works go with them.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 14
text: And I saw a white cloud, and on the cloud I saw one seated, like a son of man, having on his head a crown of gold, and in his hand a sharp curved blade.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 15
text: And another angel came out from the house of God, crying with a loud voice to him who was seated on the cloud, Put in your blade, and let the grain be cut: because the hour for cutting it is come; for the grain of the earth is over-ready.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 16
text: And he who was seated on the cloud sent in his blade on the earth; and the grain of the earth was cut.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 17
text: And another angel came out from the house of God which is in heaven, having a sharp curved blade.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 18
text: And another angel came out from the altar, who has power over fire; and he gave a loud cry to him who had the sharp curved blade, saying, Put in your sharp blade, and let the grapes of the vine of the earth be cut; for her grapes are fully ready.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 19
text: And the angel sent his blade into the earth, and the vine of the earth was cut, and he put it into the great wine-crusher of the wrath of God.

title: Revelation Chapter 14 Verse 20
text: And the grapes were crushed under foot outside the town, and blood came out from them, even to the head-bands of the horses, two hundred miles.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 1
text: And I saw another sign in heaven, great and strange; seven angels having the seven last punishments, for in them the wrath of God is complete.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 2
text: And I saw a sea which seemed like glass mixed with fire; and those who had overcome the beast and his image and the number of his name, were in their places by the sea of glass, with God's instruments of music in their hands.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 3
text: And they give the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and full of wonder are your works, O Lord God, Ruler of all; true and full of righteousness are your ways, eternal King.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 4
text: What man is there who will not have fear before you, O Lord, and give glory to your name? because you only are holy; for all the nations will come and give worship before you; for your righteousness has been made clear.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 5
text: And after these things I saw, and the house of the Tent of witness in heaven was open:

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 6
text: And the seven angels who had the seven punishments came out from the house of God, clothed with linen, clean and bright and with bands of gold about their breasts.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 7
text: And one of the four beasts gave to the seven angels seven gold vessels full of the wrath of God, who is living for ever and ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 15 Verse 8
text: And the house of God was full of smoke from the glory of God, and from his power, and no one was able to go into the house of God, till the seven punishments of the seven angels were ended.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 1
text: And a great voice out of the house of God came to my ears, saying to the seven angels, Go, and let that which is in the seven vessels of the wrath of God come down on the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 2
text: And the first went, and let what was in his vessel come down on the earth; and it became an evil poisoning wound on the men who had the mark of the beast, and who gave worship to his image.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 3
text: And the second let what was in his vessel come out into the sea; and it became blood as of a dead man; and every living thing in the sea came to an end.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 4
text: And the third let what was in his vessel come out into the rivers and the fountains of water; and they became blood.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 5
text: And the voice of the angel of the waters came to my ears, saying, True and upright is your judging, O Holy One, who is and was from all time:

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 6
text: For they made the blood of saints and prophets come out like a stream, and blood have you given them for drink; which is their right reward.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 7
text: And a voice came from the altar, saying, Even so, O Lord God, Ruler of all, true and full of righteousness is your judging.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 8
text: And the fourth let what was in his vessel come out on the sun; and power was given to it that men might be burned with fire.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 9
text: And men were burned with great heat: and they said evil things against the name of the God who has authority over these punishments; and they were not turned from their evil ways to give him glory.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 10
text: And the fifth let what was in his vessel come out on the high seat of the beast; and his kingdom was made dark; and they were biting their tongues for pain.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 11
text: And they said evil things against the God of heaven because of their pain and their wounds; and they were not turned from their evil works.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 12
text: And the sixth let what was in his vessel come out on the great river Euphrates; and it became dry, so that the way might be made ready for the kings from the east.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 13
text: And I saw coming out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet, three unclean spirits, like frogs.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 14
text: For they are evil spirits, working signs; who go out even to the kings of all the earth, to get them together to the war of the great day of God, the Ruler of all.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 15
text: (See, I come as a thief. Happy is he who is watching and keeps his robes, so that he may not go unclothed, and his shame be seen.)

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 16
text: And they got them together into the place which is named in Hebrew Armageddon.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 17
text: And the seventh let what was in his vessel come out on the air; and there came out a great voice from the house of God, from the high seat, saying, It is done.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 18
text: And there were flames and voices and thunders; and there was a great earth-shock so that never, from the time when men were on the earth, had there been so great an earth-shock, so full of power.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 19
text: And the great town was cut into three parts, and the towns of the nations came to destruction: and Babylon the great came into mind before God, to be given the cup of the wine of his wrath.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 20
text: And every island went in flight, and the mountains were seen no longer.

title: Revelation Chapter 16 Verse 21
text: And great drops of ice, every one about the weight of a talent, came down out of heaven on men: and men said evil things against God because of the punishment of the ice-drops; for it is very great.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 1
text: And one of the seven angels who had the seven vessels came and said to me, Come here, so that you may see the judging of the evil woman who is seated on the great waters;

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 2
text: With whom the kings of the earth made themselves unclean, and those who are on the earth were full of the wine of her evil desires.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 3
text: And he took me away in the Spirit into a waste land: and I saw a woman seated on a bright red beast, full of evil names, having seven heads and ten horns,

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 4
text: And the woman was clothed in purple and bright red, with ornaments of gold and stones of great price and jewels; and in her hand was a gold cup full of evil things and her unclean desires;

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 5
text: And on her brow was a name, SECRET, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF THE EVIL WOMEN AND OF THE UNCLEAN THINGS OF THE EARTH.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 6
text: And I saw the woman overcome as with the wine of the blood of the saints, and the blood of those put to death because of Jesus. And when I saw her, I was overcome with a great wonder.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 7
text: And the angel said to me, Why were you surprised? I will make clear to you the secret of the woman, and of the beast on which she is seated, which has the seven heads and the ten horns.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 8
text: The beast which you saw was, and is not; and is about to come up out of the great deep, and to go into destruction. And those who are on the earth, whose names have not been put in the book of life from the first, will be full of wonder when they see the beast, that he was, and is not, and still will be.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 9
text: Here is the mind which has wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman is seated:

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 10
text: And they are seven kings; the five have come to an end, the one is, the other has not come; and when he comes, he will have to go on for a little time.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 11
text: And the beast which was, and is not, is himself the eighth, and is of the seven; and he goes into destruction.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 12
text: And the ten horns which you saw are ten kings, which still have been given no kingdom; but they are given authority as kings, with the beast, for one hour.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 13
text: These have one mind, and they give their power and authority to the beast.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 14
text: These will make war against the Lamb, and the Lamb will overcome them, because he is the Lord of lords and King of kings; and those who are with him are named, marked out, and true.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 15
text: And he said to me, The waters which you saw, where the evil woman is seated, are peoples, and armies, and nations and languages.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 16
text: And the ten horns which you saw, and the beast, these will be turned against the evil woman, and will make her waste and uncovered, and will take her flesh for food, and will have her burned with fire.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 17
text: Because God has put it in their hearts to do his purpose, and to be of one mind, giving their kingdom to the beast, till the words of God have effect and are complete.

title: Revelation Chapter 17 Verse 18
text: And the woman whom you saw is the great town, which is ruling over the kings of the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 1
text: After these things I saw another angel coming down out of heaven, having great authority; and the earth was bright with his glory.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 2
text: And he gave a loud cry, saying, Babylon the great has come down from her high place, she has come to destruction and has become a place of evil spirits, and of every unclean spirit, and a hole for every unclean and hated bird.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 3
text: For through the wine of the wrath of her evil desires all the nations have come to destruction; and the kings of the earth made themselves unclean with her, and the traders of the earth had their wealth increased by the power of her evil ways.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 4
text: And another voice from heaven came to my ears, saying, Come out of her, my people, so that you may have no part in her sins and in her punishments.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 5
text: For her sins have gone up even to heaven, and God has taken note of her evil-doing.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 6
text: Give to her as she gave, even an increased reward for her works; in the cup which was mixed by her, let there be mixed as much again for herself.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 7
text: As she gave glory to herself, and became more evil in her ways, in the same measure give her pain and weeping: for she says in her heart, I am seated here a queen, and am no widow, and will in no way see sorrow.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 8
text: For this reason in one day will her troubles come, death and sorrow and need of food; and she will be completely burned with fire; for strong is the Lord God who is her judge.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 9
text: And the kings of the earth, who made themselves unclean with her, and in her company gave themselves up to evil, will be weeping and crying over her, when they see the smoke of her burning,

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 10
text: Watching from far away, for fear of her punishment, saying, Sorrow, sorrow for Babylon, the great town, the strong town! for in one hour you have been judged.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 11
text: And the traders of the earth are weeping and crying over her, because no man has any more desire for their goods,

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 12
text: Gold, and silver, and stones of great price, and jewels, and delicate linen, and robes of purple and silk and red; and perfumed wood, and every vessel of ivory, and every vessel made of fair wood, and of brass, and iron, and stone;

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 13
text: And sweet-smelling plants, and perfumes, and wine, and oil, and well crushed grain, and cattle and sheep; and horses and carriages and servants; and souls of men.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 14
text: And the fruit of your soul's desire has gone from you, and all things delicate and shining have come to an end and will never again be seen.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 15
text: The traders in these things, by which their wealth was increased, will be watching far off for fear of her punishment, weeping and crying;

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 16
text: Saying, Sorrow, sorrow for the great town, she who was clothed in delicate linen, and purple, and red; with ornaments of gold and stones of great price and jewels!

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 17
text: For in one hour such great wealth has come to nothing. And every shipmaster, and all who are sailing on the sea, and sailors and all who get their living by the sea, were watching from far away,

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 18
text: And crying out when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What town is like the great town?

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 19
text: And they put dust on their heads, and were sad, weeping and crying, and saying, Sorrow, sorrow for the great town, in which was increased the wealth of all who had their ships on the sea because of her great stores! for in one hour she is made waste.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 20
text: Be glad over her, heaven, and you saints, and Apostles, and prophets; because she has been judged by God on your account.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 21
text: And a strong angel took up a stone like the great stone with which grain is crushed, and sent it into the sea, saying, So, with a great fall, will Babylon, the great town, come to destruction, and will not be seen any more at all.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 22
text: And the voice of players and makers of music will never again be sounding in you: and no worker, expert in art, will ever again be living in you; and there will be no sound of the crushing of grain any more at all in you;

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 23
text: And never again will the shining of lights be seen in you; and the voice of the newly-married man and the bride will never again be sounding in you: for your traders were the lords of the earth, and by your evil powers were all the nations turned out of the right way.

title: Revelation Chapter 18 Verse 24
text: And in her was seen the blood of prophets and of saints, and of all who have been put to death on the earth.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 1
text: After these things there came to my ears a sound like the voice of a great band of people in heaven, saying, Praise to the Lord; salvation and glory and power be to our God:

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 2
text: For true and upright are his decisions; for by him has the evil woman been judged, who made the earth unclean with the sins of her body; and he has given her punishment for the blood of his servants.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 3
text: And again they said, Praise to the Lord. And her smoke went up for ever and ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 4
text: And the four and twenty rulers and the four beasts went down on their faces and gave worship to God who was seated on the high seat, saying, Even so, praise to the Lord.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 5
text: And a voice came from the high seat, saying, Give praise to our God, all you his servants, small and great, in whom is the fear of him.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 6
text: And there came to my ears the voice of a great army, like the sound of waters, and the sound of loud thunders, saying, Praise to the Lord: for the Lord our God, Ruler of all, is King.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 7
text: Let us be glad with delight, and let us give glory to him: because the time is come for the Lamb to be married, and his wife has made herself ready.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 8
text: And to her it was given to be clothed in delicate linen, clean and shining: for the clean linen is the righteousness of the saints.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 9
text: And he said to me, Put in the book, Happy are the guests at the bride-feast of the Lamb. And he said to me, These are the true words of God.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 10
text: And I went on my face before his feet to give him worship. And he said to me, See you do it not: I am a brother-servant with you and with your brothers who keep the witness of Jesus: give worship to God: for the witness of Jesus is the spirit of the prophet's word.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 11
text: And the heaven was open; and I saw a white horse, and he who was seated on it was named Certain and True; and he is judging and making war in righteousness.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 12
text: And his eyes are a flame of fire, and crowns are on his head; and he has a name in writing, of which no man has knowledge but himself.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 13
text: And he is clothed in a robe washed with blood: and his name is The Word of God.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 14
text: And the armies which are in heaven went after him on white horses, clothed in delicate linen, white and clean.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 15
text: And out of his mouth comes a sharp sword, with which he overcomes the nations: and he has rule over them with a rod of iron: and he is crushing with his feet the grapes of the strong wrath of God the Ruler of all.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 16
text: And on his robe and on his leg is a name, KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 17
text: And I saw an angel taking his place in the sun; and he was crying with a loud voice, saying to all the birds in flight in the heavens, Come together to the great feast of God;

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 18
text: So that you may take for your food the flesh of kings, and of captains, and of strong men, and of horses and of those who are seated on them, and the flesh of all men, free and unfree, small and great.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 19
text: And I saw the beast, and the kings of the earth, and their armies, come together to make war against him who was seated on the horse and against his army.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 20
text: And the beast was taken, and with him the false prophet who did the signs before him, by which they were turned from the true way who had the mark of the beast, and who gave worship to his image: these two were put living into the sea of ever-burning fire.

title: Revelation Chapter 19 Verse 21
text: And the rest were put to death with the sword of him who was on the horse, even the sword which came out of his mouth: and all the birds were made full with their flesh.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 1
text: And I saw an angel coming down out of heaven, having the key of the great deep and a great chain in his hand.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 2
text: And he took the dragon, the old snake, which is the Evil One and Satan, and put chains on him for a thousand years,

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 3
text: And put him into the great deep, and it was shut and locked over him, so that he might put the nations in error no longer, till the thousand years were ended: after this he will be let loose for a little time.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 4
text: And I saw high seats, and they were seated on them, and the right of judging was given to them: and I saw the souls of those who were put to death for the witness of Jesus, and for the word of God, and those who did not give worship to the beast, or to his image, and had not his mark on their brows or on their hands; and they were living and ruling with Christ a thousand years.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 5
text: The rest of the dead did not come to life again till the thousand years were ended. This is the first coming back from the dead.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 6
text: Happy and holy is he who has a part in this first coming: over these the second death has no authority, but they will be priests of God and of Christ, and will be ruling with him a thousand years.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 7
text: And when the thousand years are ended, Satan will be let loose out of his prison,

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 8
text: And will go out to put in error the nations which are in the four quarters of the earth, Gog and Magog, to get them together to the war, the number of whom is like the sands of the sea.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 9
text: And they went up over the face of the earth, and made a circle about the tents of the saints, and the well loved town: and fire came down out of heaven for their destruction.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 10
text: And the Evil One who put them in error was sent down into the sea of ever-burning fire, where the beast and the false prophet are, and their punishment will go on day and night for ever and ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 11
text: And I saw a great white seat, and him who was seated on it, before whose face the earth and the heaven went in flight; and there was no place for them.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 12
text: And I saw the dead, great and small, taking their places before the high seat; and the books were open, and another book was open, which is the book of life; and the dead were judged by the things which were in the books, even by their works.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 13
text: And the sea gave up the dead which were in it; and death and Hell gave up the dead which were in them; and they were judged every man by his works.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 14
text: And death and Hell were put into the sea of fire. This is the second death, even the sea of fire.

title: Revelation Chapter 20 Verse 15
text: And if anyone's name was not in the book of life, he went down into the sea of fire.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 1
text: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were gone; and there was no more sea.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 2
text: And I saw the holy town, new Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God, like a bride made beautiful for her husband.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 3
text: And there came to my ears a great voice out of the high seat, saying, See, the Tent of God is with men, and he will make his living-place with them, and they will be his people, and God himself will be with them, and be their God.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 4
text: And he will put an end to all their weeping; and there will be no more death, or sorrow, or crying, or pain; for the first things have come to an end.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 5
text: And he who is seated on the high seat said, See, I make all things new. And he said, Put it in the book; for these words are certain and true.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 6
text: And he said to me, It is done. I am the First and the Last, the start and the end. I will freely give of the fountain of the water of life to him who is in need.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 7
text: He who overcomes will have these things for his heritage; and I will be his God, and he will be my son.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 8
text: But those who are full of fear and without faith, the unclean and takers of life, those who do the sins of the flesh, and those who make use of evil powers or who give worship to images, and all those who are false, will have their part in the sea of ever-burning fire which is the second death.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 9
text: And one of the seven angels who had the seven vessels in which were the seven last punishments, came and said to me, Come here, and see the bride, the Lamb's wife.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 10
text: And he took me away in the Spirit to a great and high mountain, and let me see the holy town Jerusalem, coming down out of heaven from God,

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 11
text: Having the glory of God: and her light was like a stone of great price, a jasper stone, clear as glass:

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 12
text: She had a wall great and high, with twelve doors, and at the doors twelve angels; and names on them, which are the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 13
text: And on the east were three doors; and on the north three doors; and on the south three doors; and on the west three doors.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 14
text: And the wall of the town had twelve bases, and on them the twelve names of the twelve Apostles of the Lamb.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 15
text: And he who was talking with me had a gold measuring-rod to take the measure of the town, and of its doors, and its wall.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 16
text: And the town is square, as wide as it is long; and he took the measure of the town with the rod, one thousand and five hundred miles: it is equally long and wide and high.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 17
text: And he took the measure of its wall, one hundred and forty-four cubits, after the measure of a man, that is, of an angel.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 18
text: And the building of its wall was of jasper, and the town was clear gold, clear as glass.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 19
text: The bases of the wall of the town had ornaments of all sorts of beautiful stones. The first base was jasper; the second, sapphire; the third, chalcedony; the fourth, emerald;

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 20
text: The fifth, sardonyx; the sixth, sardius; the seventh, chrysolite; the eighth, beryl; the ninth, topaz; the tenth, chrysoprase; the eleventh, jacinth; the twelfth, amethyst.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 21
text: And the twelve doors were twelve pearls; every door was made of one pearl; and the street of the town was clear gold, as clear as glass.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 22
text: And I saw no Temple there; because the Lord God, the Ruler of all, and the Lamb are its Temple.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 23
text: And the town has no need of the sun, or of the moon, to give it light: for the glory of God did make it light, and the light of it is the Lamb.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 24
text: And the nations will go in its light: and the kings of the earth will take their glory into it.

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 25
text: And the doors of it will never be shut by day (for there is no night there):

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 26
text: And the glory and honour of the nations will come into it:

title: Revelation Chapter 21 Verse 27
text: And nothing unclean may come into it, or anyone whose works are cursed or false; but only those whose names are in the Lamb's book of life.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 1
text: And I saw a river of water of life, clear as glass, coming out of the high seat of God and of the Lamb,

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 2
text: In the middle of its street. And on this side of the river and on that was the tree of life, having twelve sorts of fruits, giving its fruit every month; and the leaves of the tree give life to the nations.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 3
text: And there will be no more curse: and the high seat of God and of the Lamb will be there; and his servants will be worshipping him;

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 4
text: And they will see his face; and his name will be on their brows.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 5
text: And there will be no more night; and they have no need of a light or of the shining of the sun; for the Lord God will give them light: and they will be ruling for ever and ever.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 6
text: And he said to me, These words are certain and true: and the Lord, the God of the spirits of the prophets, sent his angel to make clear to his servants the things which are now to come about.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 7
text: See, I come quickly. A blessing on him who keeps the words of this book of the prophet.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 8
text: And I, John, am he who saw these things and to whose ears they came. And when I had seen and given ear, I went down on my face to give worship at the feet of the angel who made these things clear to me.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 9
text: And he said to me, See you do it not; I am a brother-servant with you and with your brothers the prophets, and with those who keep the words of this book: give worship to God.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 10
text: And he said to me, Let not the words of this prophet's book be kept secret, because the time is near.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 11
text: Let the evil man go on in his evil: and let the unclean be still unclean: and let the upright go on in his righteousness: and let the holy be holy still.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 12
text: See, I come quickly; and my reward is with me, to give to every man the outcome of his works.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 13
text: I am the First and the Last, the start and the end.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 14
text: A blessing on those whose robes are washed, so that they may have a right to the tree of life, and may go in by the doors into the town.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 15
text: Outside are the dogs, and those who make use of evil powers, those who make themselves unclean, and the takers of life, and those who give worship to images, and everyone whose delight is in what is false.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 16
text: I, Jesus, have sent my angel to give witness to you of these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, the bright and morning star.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 17
text: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him who gives ear, say, Come. And let him who is in need come; and let everyone desiring it take of the water of life freely.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 18
text: For I say to every man to whose ears have come the words of this prophet's book, If any man makes an addition to them, God will put on him the punishments which are in this book:

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 19
text: And if any man takes away from the words of this book, God will take away from him his part in the tree of life and the holy town, even the things which are in this book.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 20
text: He who gives witness to these things says, Truly, I come quickly. Even so come, Lord Jesus.

title: Revelation Chapter 22 Verse 21
text: The grace of the Lord Jesus be with the saints. So be it.
